scripts.local: cross-env dotenv -e .env.development -- webpack --config webpack.webcomponent.config.js && NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=certs/lbtw.ca.starlbtwsys.20230719.20321231.crt next dev
scripts.build:dev.local: cross-env dotenv -e .env.dev.local -- next build && webpack --config webpack.webcomponent.config.js && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.dev.local node -r dotenv/config build.js
scripts.build:dev: cross-env dotenv -e .env.dev -- next build && webpack --config webpack.webcomponent.config.js && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.dev node -r dotenv/config build.js
scripts.build:stg: cross-env dotenv -e .env.stg -- next build && webpack --config webpack.webcomponent.config.js && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.stg node -r dotenv/config build.js
scripts.build:uat: cross-env dotenv -e .env.uat -- next build && webpack --config webpack.webcomponent.config.js && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.uat node -r dotenv/config build.js
scripts.build:prod: cross-env dotenv -e .env.prod -- next build && webpack --config webpack.webcomponent.config.js && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.prod node -r dotenv/config build.js
